ANU.name: John Pearce
interest: The importance of test-retest variability in automated perimetry and SD-OCT in the diagnosis and management of glaucoma.Investigation of modifiable factors which may influence retest variabilityAspects of inter-clinic variability in diagnostic glaucoma parameters
ANU.biography: Currently: Optometrist in private practice 2 days a week in a regional area of NSW, farmer 5 days a week, and part-time researcher with the Maddess group at the John Curtin School of Medical Research (ANU).

publication.title: Inter-visit Test-retest Variability of the Topcon 3D OCT-2000 in Glaucoma
publication.source: Optometry and Vision Science, vol. 94, no. 3, pp. 404-410

publication.title: Retest Variability in the Medmont M700 Automated Perimeter
publication.source: Optometry and Vision Science, vol. 93, no. 3, pp. 272-280
